tool_description: Get random riddles or search based on category or freeform text.
name: Riddles
title: Riddles

api_list.name: /riddle/search
api_list.description: Search for random riddle which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional).

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category to get the riddle from

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Text to search for in the riddle

api_list.name: /riddle/random
api_list.description: Get a random riddle for a given category(optional)

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category to get the riddle from
